    level="1"
    right="Feat 20"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Reflecting Riposte](/Feats.aspx?ID=1247) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Extinction Curse</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Fighter" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=71" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #156: The Apocalypse Prophet](/Sources.aspx?ID=36) pg. 72

**Prerequisites**
[Dueling Riposte](/Feats.aspx?ID=389), [Mirror Shield](/Feats.aspx?ID=404), or [Twin Riposte](/Feats.aspx?ID=523)

**Trigger**
An opponent casts a spell and you critically succeed at a saving throw against it.

**Requirements**
You have a shield raised or are benefiting from [Dueling Parry](/Feats.aspx?ID=367) or [Twin Parry](/Feats.aspx?ID=377).

</column>

---

You attempt to [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) the triggering spell using powerful magical techniques observed in the Kortos Mounts. Use your attack roll modifier with your shield or parrying weapon for your counteract check. If you counteract the spell, it is reflected upon the caster. If the spell targeted individual creatures, it targets the caster only. If the spell targeted an area centered on a point, the new area is centered on the caster. If the spell was a cone or line, the cone or line emanates from you toward the caster. If the spell has a save DC, it uses your class DC, and if it requires a spell attack roll, use the same attack roll modifier as the counteract check.

<title level="2">Capstone Feats</title>

**Source** [Pathfinder #156: The Apocalypse Prophet](/Sources.aspx?ID=36) pg. 72

Characters who have reached 20th level can choose from the following feats, representing the pinnacle of mortal power influenced by their triumphs.

**Related Feats**: [Annihilating Swing](/Feats.aspx?ID=1240), [Astonishing Explosion](/Feats.aspx?ID=1241), [Banishing Blow](/Feats.aspx?ID=1242), [Denier of Destruction](/Feats.aspx?ID=1243), [Endurance of the Rooted Tree](/Feats.aspx?ID=1244), [Mimic Protections](/Feats.aspx?ID=1245), [Reclaim Spell](/Feats.aspx?ID=1246), [Ringmaster's Introduction](/Feats.aspx?ID=1248), [Steal Essence](/Feats.aspx?ID=1249), [Tenacious Blood Magic](/Feats.aspx?ID=1250), [Verdant Presence](/Feats.aspx?ID=1251)
